name: ampersand-jsonapi-model
description: An extension to ampersand-model that adds methods and properties for working with JSON-API.
author: Bob Holt

scripts.lint: npm run lint-src && npm run lint-test
scripts.preversion: git checkout master && git pull && npm ls && npm run test
scripts.publish-patch: npm run preversion && npm version patch && git push origin master --tags && npm publish
scripts.publish-minor: npm run preversion && npm version minor && git push origin master --tags && npm publish
scripts.publish-major: npm run preversion && npm version major && git push origin master --tags && npm publish
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run build && browserify test/*.js -t [ babelify ] | tape-run | tap-spec
